channel.title: Clients and sources for 64 bit pc's
channel.description: hi can anyone give me a link to a client and source that works for 64 bit pc's every time i download a client and run it and login and then press twice it shuts down so anyone plz

item.title: Clients and sources for 64 bit pc's
item.dc:creator: @imsokool22 imsokool22
item.description:
@imsokool22 wrote:

uhh u need to download 32-bit java since u have 64-bit.In java 32-bit will work for 64-bit since you have a 32-bit java vm and not a 64-bit java vm. Pretty much that should change your problem.

Read full topic
